name: @jackoatmon/opencode-shared-orchestration
description: Shared context utilities for OpenCode orchestration (session IDs, quota signals)

scripts.test: node -e "const cu = require('./src/context-utils.js'); console.log('createOrchestrationId:', cu.createOrchestrationId()); console.log('pickSessionId:', cu.pickSessionId(null, 'ses_123')); console.log('PASS');"

author: OpenCode
